snippet: Doctors are not exactly sure why some grueling workouts lead to rhabdomyolysis, which in severe cases can cause kidney failure, while similar ones do not.
lead_paragraph: Doctors are not exactly sure why some grueling workouts lead to rhabdomyolysis, which in severe cases can cause kidney failure, while similar ones do not.

headline.main: Down for the Count After a Hard Workout
headline.print_headline: Down for the Count After a Hard Workout
